targets.rawSql:
select lastName as 'Player Name', steamID as 'Steam ID'
from DBLog_SteamUsers
where steamID = $PLAYERID

select count(*) as Incaps
              from DBLog_Wounds
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
              where attacker = $PLAYERID
                and victim != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Wounds.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}

select count(*) as Kills
              from DBLog_Deaths
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
              where attacker = $PLAYERID
                and victim != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Deaths.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}

select count(*) as Fallen
              from DBLog_Wounds
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
              where victim = $PLAYERID
                and attacker != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Wounds.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}

select count(*) as Deaths
              from DBLog_Deaths
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
              where victim = $PLAYERID
                and attacker != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Deaths.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}

select weapon as 'Weapon', count(*) as 'Incaps'
from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
where attacker = $PLAYERID
  and teamkill = 0
  and DBLog_Wounds.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by weapon
order by Incaps desc

select incaps/matches as 'Incaps', kills/matches as 'Kills', downed/matches as 'Fallen', deaths/matches as 'Deaths'
from (select lastname,
             steamID,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Wounds
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
              where attacker = $PLAYERID
                and victim != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Wounds.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as incaps,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Deaths
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
              where attacker = $PLAYERID
                and victim != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Deaths.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as kills,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Wounds
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
              where victim = $PLAYERID
                and attacker != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Wounds.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as downed,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Deaths
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
              where victim = $PLAYERID
                and attacker != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Deaths.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as deaths,
            (select count(*)
           from (select D.id
           from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches D on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = D.id
           where (victim = $PLAYERID or attacker = $PLAYERID)
           and D.server != 3
           and map != 'Jensen\'s'
           ${seed:value}
           group by D.id) as matches
           ) as matches
      from DBLog_SteamUsers
      where steamID = $PLAYERID
      ) as psr

select count(*) as Matches
           from (select D.id
           from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches D on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = D.id
           where (victim = $PLAYERID or attacker = $PLAYERID)
           and D.server != 3
           and map != 'Jensen\'s'
           ${seed:value}
           group by D.id) as matches

select sum(time_to_sec(timediff(ifnull(endTime,now()),startTime))/3600) as 'Total Hours'
from DBLog_PlayerTimes
where server != 3 
  and player = $PLAYERID
limit 1

select revives as 'Revives', revived as 'Revived', (revives/deaths) as 'Revives per Death', (revived/deaths) as 'Revived per Death', revives/matches as 'Revives per Match', revived/matches as 'Revived per Match'
from (select lastname,
             steamID,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Revives join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Revives.`match` = DLM.id
              where reviver = $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DLM.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as revives,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Revives join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Revives.`match` = DLM.id
              where victim = $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DLM.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as revived,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Deaths
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
              where victim = $PLAYERID
                and attacker != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Deaths.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as deaths,
            (select count(*)
           from (select D.id
           from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches D on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = D.id
           where (victim = 76561198221715432 or attacker = 76561198221715432)
           and D.server != 3
           and map != 'Jensen\'s'
           ${seed:value}
           group by D.id) as matches
           ) as matches
      from DBLog_SteamUsers
      where steamID = $PLAYERID
      ) as psr

select tks as 'TKs', tked as 'TKed', (tks/deaths) as 'TKs per Death', (tked/deaths) as 'TKed per Death', tks/matches as 'TKs per Match', tked/matches as 'TKed per Match'
from (select lastname,
             steamID,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
              where attacker = $PLAYERID
                and victim != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 1
                and DLM.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as tks,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
              where victim = $PLAYERID
                and attacker != $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 1
                and DLM.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as tked,
             (select count(*)
              from DBLog_Deaths
                       join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
              where victim = $PLAYERID
                and teamkill = 0
                and DBLog_Deaths.server != 3
                and map != 'Jensen\'s'
                ${seed:value}) as deaths,
            (select count(*)
           from (select D.id
           from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches D on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = D.id
           where (victim = 76561198221715432 or attacker = 76561198221715432)
           and D.server != 3
           and map != 'Jensen\'s'
           ${seed:value}
           group by D.id) as matches
           ) as matches
      from DBLog_SteamUsers
      where steamID = $PLAYERID
      ) as psr

select victimName as 'Player', count(*) as 'Incaps'
from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
where attacker = $PLAYERID 
  and victim is not null
  and victim != $PLAYERID 
  and teamkill = 0
  and DBLog_Wounds.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by victim
order by Incaps desc

select victimName as 'Player', count(*) as 'Kills'
from DBLog_Deaths join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
where attacker = $PLAYERID
  and victim is not null
  and victim != $PLAYERID
  and teamkill = 0
  and DLM.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by victim
order by Kills desc

select attackerName as 'Player', count(*) as 'Fallen'
from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
where victim = $PLAYERID
  and attacker != $PLAYERID
  and teamkill = 0
  and DLM.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by attacker
order by Fallen desc

select attackerName as 'Player', count(*) as 'Kills'
from DBLog_Deaths join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
where victim = $PLAYERID
  and attacker != $PLAYERID
  and teamkill = 0
  and DLM.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by attacker
order by Kills desc

select victimName as 'Player', count(*) as 'Revives'
from DBLog_Revives join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Revives.`match` = DLM.id
where victim != $PLAYERID 
  and reviver = $PLAYERID 
  and teamkill != 1
  and DLM.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by victim
order by Revives desc

select reviverName as 'Player', count(*) as 'Revived'
from DBLog_Revives join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Revives.`match` = DLM.id
where victim = $PLAYERID 
  and reviver != $PLAYERID 
  and teamkill != 1
  and DLM.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by reviver
order by Revived desc

select victimName as 'Player', count(*) as 'TKs'
from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
where victim != $PLAYERID 
  and attacker = $PLAYERID 
  and teamkill = 1
  and DLM.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by victim
order by TKs desc

select attackerName as 'Player', count(*) as 'TKed'
from DBLog_Wounds join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
where victim = $PLAYERID 
  and attacker != $PLAYERID 
  and teamkill = 1
  and DLM.server != 3
  and map != 'Jensen\'s'
  ${seed:value}
group by attacker
order by TKed desc

select time, kills/deaths as KDR
from (
select time, sum(deaths) over (order by time) as deaths, sum(kills) over (order by time) as kills
from
(select DBLog_Deaths.time,
        if(victim = $PLAYERID, 1, 0)   as deaths,
        if(attacker = $PLAYERID, 1, 0) as kills
 from DBLog_Deaths
          join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Deaths.`match` = DLM.id
 where ((attacker != $PLAYERID 
     and victim = $PLAYERID) or
        (attacker = $PLAYERID 
            and victim != $PLAYERID))
   and teamkill = 0
   and DBLog_Deaths.server != 3
   and map != 'Jensen\'s') as kdtime) as kdsum

select time, kills/deaths as IPF
from (
select time, sum(deaths) over (order by time) as deaths, sum(kills) over (order by time) as kills
from
(select DBLog_Wounds.time,
        if(victim = $PLAYERID, 1, 0)   as deaths,
        if(attacker = $PLAYERID, 1, 0) as kills
 from DBLog_Wounds
          join DBLog_Matches DLM on DBLog_Wounds.`match` = DLM.id
 where ((attacker != $PLAYERID 
     and victim = $PLAYERID) or
        (attacker = $PLAYERID 
            and victim != $PLAYERID))
   and teamkill = 0
   and DBLog_Wounds.server != 3
   and map != 'Jensen\'s') as kdtime) as kdsum

list.definition:
select steamID as __value, lastName as __text
from DBLog_SteamUsers
list.label: Player Name
list.name: PLAYERID
list.query:
select steamID as __value, lastName as __text
from DBLog_SteamUsers

list.label: Include Seeding
list.name: seed
list.query: no : and layerClassname not regexp '_Seed_', yes : and layerClassname is not null
